Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Mice with a larger deletion involving both Snrpn and the putative PWS - IC lack expression of the imprinted genes Zfp127 ( mouse homologue of ZNF127 ) , Ndn and Ipw , and manifest several phenotypes common to PWS infants .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Prader-Willi Syndrome (PWS) |
| Deletion involving Snrpn and the putative PWS-IC |
| Absence of imprinted genes: Zfp127 (mouse homologue of ZNF127), Ndn, and Ipw |
